attributes.action: Deport illegal immigrants that should'nt be here regardless of how long they've managed to stay in our country illegally.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If i have understood correctly, currently if illegal immigrants cases take longer than a certain amount of time to asses they are allowed to stay in our country anyway!? I think that if they should'nt be here they should be sent home regardless of their length of stay

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
